metadata.name: Fly me to the moon
metadata.description:
My friend Ryad Merhy, the boxing champion from my eponymous collection, has signed a contract for his next big challenge, a world championship final on March 18 in Johannesburg, South Africa. As a photographer and avid supporter of his career, I've always found a way to fund these trips to capture his performances. Unfortunately, the budget for the trip is not available this time.

I am passionate about capturing the moments behind the scenes of the fight and at the ringside. I love making this trip a reality. I found a creative way to fund my expenses by launching a sort of crowdfunding campaign with NFT. I'm offering a limited run of 100 editions at 0.015 ETH each, with the goal of raising 1.5 ETH to cover my expenses. In addition, I'm offering a 50% discount on future 1/1 NFTs I sell, and for those who purchase in the next 4 weeks, an additional 1/1 NFT (airdrop) that I will create in South Africa. Once I reach my goal, I will burn all unsold editions.

This project not only combines the world of Web3 with the real story of a photographer's journey, my journey in the blockchain and IRL, but it also offers a unique opportunity for owners to support and be a part of the journey.

So will you help me fly to the moon?
